001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.os.Bundle;
005import android.transition.Slide;
006import android.view.Gravity;
007import android.view.Window;
008import androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultLauncher;
009import androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContracts.StartActivityForResult;
010import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
011import androidx.core.app.ActivityOptionsCompat;
012import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
013import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
014import com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar;
015import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.databinding.ActivityLoginBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
019
020@AndroidEntryPoint
021public class LoginActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
022
023  private ActivityLoginBinding binding;
024  private LoginViewModel viewModel;
025  private ActivityResultLauncher<Intent> launcher;
026  private boolean silent;
027
028  @Override
029  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
030    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
031    getWindow().requestFeature(Window.FEATURE_ACTIVITY_TRANSITIONS);
032    getWindow().setEnterTransition(new Slide(Gravity.START));
033    getWindow().setExitTransition(new Slide(Gravity.START));
034    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this)
035        .get(LoginViewModel.class);
036    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
037    launcher = registerForActivityResult(new StartActivityForResult(), viewModel::completeSignIn);
038    silent = true;
039    viewModel
040        .getAccount()
041        .observe(this, this::handleAccount);
042    viewModel
043        .getThrowable()
044        .observe(this, this::informFailure);
045  }
046
047  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account) {
048    if (account != null) {
049      Intent intent = new Intent(this, MainActivity.class)
050          .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
051      //noinspection unchecked
052      startActivity(intent, ActivityOptionsCompat.makeSceneTransitionAnimation(this).toBundle());
053    } else if (silent) {
054      silent = false;
055      binding = ActivityLoginBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
056      binding.signIn.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.startSignIn(launcher));
057      setContentView(binding.getRoot());
058    }
059  }
060
061  private void informFailure(Throwable throwable) {
062    if (throwable != null) {
063      Snackbar.make(binding.getRoot(), R.string.login_failure_message, Snackbar.LENGTH_LONG)
064          .show();
065    }
066  }
067
068}
